About Olympic SEO

Meet Kyle England

Your Local SEO Partner in Port Townsend

Dedicated to helping Olympic Peninsula businesses dominate local search with personalized strategies, modern technology, and genuine local expertise.

Port Townsend Local
My Story

From Customer Service to SEO Excellence

How a passion for helping people and a background in IT led to Olympic SEO

The Foundation: Customer Service Excellence

My career began in customer service, where I learned that success comes from truly understanding what people need and delivering solutions that exceed expectations. This foundation taught me that business isn't just about services—it's about relationships, trust, and genuine care for outcomes.

Technical Evolution: IT Consulting & Computer Repair

As technology became central to business success, I expanded into IT consulting and computer repair. Working with small businesses across the Olympic Peninsula, I saw firsthand how the right technology solutions could transform operations—and how the wrong ones could create frustration and lost opportunities.

The SEO Revelation: Where It All Came Together

When I discovered SEO, everything clicked. Here was a field that combined my technical skills with my passion for helping businesses succeed. More importantly, I realized that local businesses in Port Townsend and the Olympic Peninsula were being underserved by generic SEO agencies that didn't understand our unique market.

Local Focus

Why I Choose to Serve the Olympic Peninsula

Understanding our unique market makes all the difference

🌲

Seasonal Tourism Patterns

I understand how Peninsula businesses need to maximize summer tourism while building year-round local customer bases. SEO strategies must account for dramatic seasonal search volume changes.

🏔️

Geographic Challenges

Being somewhat isolated from major cities creates unique opportunities. Local businesses can dominate searches without competing against massive urban enterprises.

🤝

Community-Centered Business

Peninsula customers value authentic local connections. SEO here isn't just about rankings—it's about showcasing the genuine community relationships that drive business.

⚡

Technology Gap Opportunity

Many Peninsula businesses are underutilizing digital marketing. This creates huge opportunities for those willing to invest in professional SEO and modern web presence.

Our Mission

Help Every Olympic Peninsula Business Dominate Their Local Market

To provide Olympic Peninsula businesses with SEO strategies so effective and affordable that geographic isolation becomes a competitive advantage, not a limitation.

Honesty & Transparency

No inflated promises or hidden fees. You'll always know exactly what we're doing and why, with clear reporting on results.

Local Commitment

Exclusively serving Olympic Peninsula businesses. Your success strengthens our entire community.

Results-Driven

Every strategy is backed by data and focused on measurable business outcomes, not vanity metrics.

Personal Service

You work directly with me, not a team of junior specialists. 24-hour response guarantee.
